publications.name: Intergenerational Redistribution with Endogenous Constraints to Household Debt
publications.summary: When households have limited commitment to debt repayment, transfers between generations worsen credit constraints on the young, while government debt relax them.

publications.summary: Zero-interest loan can significantly increase investment in home energy retrofits, but institutional bottlenecks make it hard to implement such a program.
